footer.about_description: A trusted food platform that brings nature's freshest products to your doorstep. Quality and customer satisfaction are our priority.
footer.newsletter_description: Subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated with special offers and innovations.
footer.copyright: Â© {{year}} Metropolitan Food Group. All rights reserved.
footer.mobile_app_description: Click on QR code to enlarge. Scan with your phone to go to the store.

support.title: Support
support.whatsapp_message: Hello, I would like to get help about Metropolitan Food Group.

faq.delivery_answer: Your orders are shipped within 1-3 business days after confirmation. Tracking number is sent via SMS.
faq.payment_question: Which payment methods do you accept?
faq.payment_answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards and wire transfers. Corporate customers can pay by invoice.
faq.return_question: What are the return and exchange terms?
faq.return_answer: You can return products within 14 days of delivery, provided they are unopened and unused.
faq.cancel_question: How can I cancel my order?
faq.cancel_answer: You can cancel from My Orders section before shipping. For shipped orders, please contact customer service.

support.help_center_desc: We are here to provide you with the best service. Don't hesitate to contact us with any questions.

errors.INSUFFICIENT_STOCK: You can add a maximum of {{stock}} units of this product.
errors.INSUFFICIENT_STOCK_ALREADY_IN_CART: You have {{inCart}} units of this product in your cart. You can add a maximum of {{canAdd}} more units.
errors.MIN_QUANTITY_NOT_MET: Minimum {{minQuantity}} pieces required for this product.
errors.CART_ADD_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred while adding the product to the cart. Please try again.
errors.CART_UPDATE_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred while updating the product. Please try again.
errors.ERROR_BOUNDARY_DESCRIPTION: An unexpected error occurred in our application. We will fix this as soon as possible.
errors.ERROR_BOUNDARY_SUPPORT: If the problem persists, you can contact our support team.
errors.RATE_LIMIT_DEFAULT: Too many requests, please try again later.
errors.RATE_LIMIT_AUTH: Too many authentication attempts. Please try again later.
errors.RATE_LIMIT_OTP_SEND: Too many OTP requests. Please wait 1 minute before trying again.
errors.RATE_LIMIT_OTP_VERIFY: Too many verification attempts. Please wait 5 minutes.
errors.RATE_LIMIT_REFRESH_TOKEN: Too many token refresh attempts. Please try again later.
errors.RATE_LIMIT_ORDER_CREATION: Too many order requests. Please slow down.
errors.RATE_LIMIT_DATA_EXPORT: Data export limit reached. Please try again tomorrow.
errors.RATE_LIMIT_SEARCH: Too many search requests. Please slow down.
errors.NOT_FOUND_ERROR: The requested resource was not found
